In contrast, the protozoan can cause chronic severe secretory diarrhea in immunosuppressed patients ( 1 ).Somatostatin has controlled diarrhea in patients with Zollinger-Ellison syndrome (2), Werner-Morrison syndrome (3-5) and the carcinoid syndrome (6).
